All, this also arrived today, I know little of Kozuka but the quality 
looks ok, I needed it to finish off some koshirae. Any thoughts as to 
school ?, I am very sure it would be mid edo. It came with a nice Inoue 
Shinkai Kogatana, I should submit that for Juyo hey  :-)

Cheers

Rich
